item.description:
Herb is throwing a unique vegetarian Thanksgiving party with a theme of gratitude! This will be a great alternative to the crowded and loud bar scene. Herbâ€™s party will be fun, with a quiet and intimate setting where you have a chance to have a conversation with the people around you. For the first two hours we will enjoy hanging out and eating Thanksgiving dishes and junk food. At 9:00 Herb will lead an informal, fun and meaningful discussion about gratitude. Afterwards we might resume hanging out or tell stories.

The party is also a potluck so if you can please bring a vegetarian dish/snack or candy! This being The Unique Journey, feel free to wear a Halloween costume (every day should be Halloween)! Costumes and potluck items are optional, but there is a $10.00 cover charge (which is much less than what other events are charging). The party goes from 7:00 - 11:00 so feel free to come and go whenever you want.
item.name: Unique Thanksgiving Party
